teams.rolebased
Class RoleBasedTeam

java.lang.Object
  EDU.gatech.cc.is.abstractrobot.ControlSystemS
      EDU.gatech.cc.is.abstractrobot.ControlSystemSS
          teams.rolebased.RoleBasedTeam

public abstract class RoleBasedTeam
extends EDU.gatech.cc.is.abstractrobot.ControlSystemSS

RoleBasedTeam is a Control System whose behavior is defined based on predefined roles. All team players share a team manager.

RoleBasedTeam is an abstract class. To use it you must extend this class and implement the following methods

  • getRoles: Returns an array with the roles for each team player
  • getTeamManager: Returns the team manager for this team.

See Also:
Role, TeamManager

Method Detail

Configure

public void Configure()
Configures the robot. Roles are obtained by means of the getRoles() method. The team manager is obtained with the getTeamManager()
